Package g41163.quarto.model

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Board
    A class that represents the game board
    JUnitTests
    Test cases for every class in the package
    MainTest
    A class that tests the integration of all the components necessary for the game to work
    Piece
    Represents a piece in the game of Quarto
    Position
    A class that represents a piece's position on the game board
    Stock
    A class representing the current stock of playable Piece objects
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Color
    An enum that represents the two possible colors of a Quarto piece
    Filling
    An enum that represents the two possible fillings of a Quarto piece
    Shape
    An enum that represents the two possible shapes of a Quarto piece
    Size
    An enum that represents the two possible sizes of a Quarto piece
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    QuartoException
    A class for the QuartoException exception, handles incoherences in the g41163.quarto.model package
